name: The Fifth Prayer
description:
In this game, you play as a Lunar Priestess, trapped in a sanctum's courtyard, with evil spirits trying to get you. You must use you attacks and special "Moon Alignments" to survive for as long as you can

Controls

You can walk with either WASD or the Arrow Keys

Attacks:

Melee Attack - LeftMouseButton

Ability 1 - Shift or 1

Ability 2 - Q or 2

Ability 3 - E or 3

Ability 4 - R or 4

Gameplay

In this game, casting a certain amount of attacks will force you into temporary alignment with a specific moon depending on which attack you use the most. There are 5 Moons you can align to; Full Moon, New Moon, Blue Moon, Pink Moon and Blood Moon.

Each alignment gives different bonuses, but all of them are powerful

Temporary Alignment lasts 10 seconds

Extra Info

This game was made for the 2023 - GameJam 130 "Lunar"
